name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Story Points in Kanban Swimlanes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show story points in Jira Kanban and Swimlane boards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension calculates the total story points for each status column in a Jira Kanban board. It also works with swimlane boards!

Works on self-hosted Jira instances, too.

Have feedback or bug reports? email db.webstore.extensions@gmail.com
